    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update()
        According the playlist id, update or insert: if id is -1, insert playlist if id is greater than 0, update playlist
        Returns:
        int: 1 if has been updated or inserted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error

      • delete

        public int delete()
        According the playlist id, delete that playlist from the database
        Returns:
        int: 1 if the playlist has been deleted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error
